articles.title: Ethiopian refugee in car accident is left for dead en route to SA - News24
articles.description: A Zimbabwean court has heard how an Ethiopian national in transit to South Africa was left for dead by his colleagues after a car accident.
articles.content:
• An Ethiopian illegal immigrant was fined and awaits deportation from Zimbabwe.
  • He was left for dead by the roadside as others made the trip to South Africa.

articles.title: Dakar 2023 | SA the talk of the town as world's toughest race comes to a close - News24
articles.description: The South African competitors in the 2023 Dakar Rally performed admirably, showcasing that our local talent can keep up with the world's best.
articles.content:
South Africans were the talk of the town during the 2023 Dakar Rally. 
Qatari Nasser Al-Attiyah and his French co-driver Mathieu Baumel won the race for a second time, racing a GR DKR Hilux T1+ prod… [+2015 chars]
